content.text: Hi! I'm getting ready for my first day of work!
I'm going to be a teacher!
Oh wow, that's awesome! I love Anne of Green Gables, and that's what Anne wanted to be when she grew up.
That's crazy! I've never met anyone else who's read it.
I love it so much! I've read it so many times.
It's so good! I'm so excited to teach it to my students.
That's so great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm really nervous, but I'm also really excited.
I'm sure you'll do great! Good luck!
